name: Shimotsuki Kouzaburou
text: [On Play] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less. Then, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with an original cost of 1 or less.

effect.text: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less. Then, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with an original cost of 1 or less.
